Uses of Class
laazotea.indi.server.INDIDeviceListener

  • Packages that use INDIDeviceListener 
    Package Description
    laazotea.indi.server
    Provides the classes necessary to create INDI Servers and a basic but functional Server.

    • Uses of INDIDeviceListener in laazotea.indi.server

      Subclasses of INDIDeviceListener in laazotea.indi.server 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  INDIClient
      A class to represent a Client that connects to the Server.
      class  INDIDevice
      A class that represents a generic INDI Device to which the server connects and parses its messages.
      class  INDIJavaDevice
      A class that represent a Java Device (created with the INDI Driver library).
      class  INDINativeDevice
      A class that represent a Native Device (created with the usual INDI library).
      class  INDINetworkDevice
      A class that represent a Network Device (another INDI server).
      Methods in laazotea.indi.server that return types with arguments of type INDIDeviceListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<INDIDeviceListener> AbstractINDIServer.getClientsListeningToDevice(java.lang.String deviceName)
      Gets a list of Clients that listen to a Device.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<INDIDeviceListener> AbstractINDIServer.getClientsListeningToProperty(java.lang.String deviceName, java.lang.String propertyName)
      Gets a list of Clients that listen to a Property.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<INDIDeviceListener> AbstractINDIServer.getClientsListeningToPropertyUpdates(java.lang.String deviceName, java.lang.String propertyName, boolean isBLOB)
      Gets a list of Clients that listen to Property updates.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<INDIDeviceListener> AbstractINDIServer.getClientsListeningToSingleProperties(java.lang.String deviceName)
      Gets a list of Clients that specifically listen to a Property of a Device.
      Methods in laazotea.indi.server with parameters of type INDIDeviceListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void AbstractINDIServer.notifyClientListenersGetProperties(INDIDeviceListener client, org.w3c.dom.Element xml)
      Notifies Devices of a getProperties message.
      protected void DefaultINDIServer.notifyClientListenersGetProperties(INDIDeviceListener client, org.w3c.dom.Element xml)
      Sends the getProperties message to the appropriate Devices.
